title: calling Projector::Load method when spawning robot from urdf

content.raw:
Hi, I am new to gazebo, and I have a question.

I'm using the PR2 that has projector at the head.
Projector itself seems to have parameters that are configurable:
#!/osrf/gazebo/src/edf9aedde3dc5ec9b68403651a2f55493b01ded0/gazebo/rendering/Projector.cc?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#Projector.cc-109:126

When spawning a robot that has a projector from urdf, children tags of <projector> seems to be ignored.
How can we set the parameter when 
spawning the robot from urdf?

I'm using the PR2 that has projector at the head. Projector itself seems to have parameters that are configurable: #!/osrf/gazebo/src/edf9aedde3dc5ec9b68403651a2f55493b01ded0/gazebo/rendering/Projector.cc?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#Projector.cc-109:126

When spawning a robot that has a projector from urdf, children tags of <projector> seems to be ignored. How can we set the parameter when spawning the robot from urdf?
